item.description:
PLEASE DO NOT SEND FUNDS VIA THE PAYPAL BUTTON. (They will go to me, and this event should be paid to AGC via their online registration. Click PREGISTER link below.)

The BSA's YPNet (Boston Society of Architects Young Professional Network) joins the AGC YCC's (Associated General Contractors Young Contractors Council) for night of fun!

This is a great opportunity for architects, designers contractors and other building professionals to network and socialize. The BSA and the AGC young professionals have a long history of collaborating on fun events, and it's always a good time!

PLEASE PREREGISTER HERE: http://www.agcmass.or...

*******************************************

It's that time of year after the holidays when things start to slow down and we get to take a break from all the year end activity and enjoy a casual evening out with our colleagues.

If you haven't attended our Billiards Bash in the past, we hope you'll join us this year! It's a great way to meet and socialize with other Young Professionals in a fun and informal atmosphere. No speaker, no stress, just a night out to shoot some pool, eat some great appetizers, and meet other construction professionals!


AGC Young Contractors is a group of construction professionals typically in the under 40 category, but if you are new to the industry or just interested in joining us all are welcome.

PLEASE PREREGISTER HERE: http://www.agcmass.or...

WHERE: Boston Billiard Club
126 Brookline Avenue, Boston
(One block south of Fenway Park)



WHEN: Thursday, January 17, 2007



TIME: 6:00 - 8:00 p.m.



COST: $30.00 per person

- Price includes billiards and appetizers

- Cash Bar

PLEASE PREREGISTER HERE: http://www.agcmass.or...
item.name: AGC Young Professionals 6th Annual Billiards Bash
